sentences.english: A: I'm going from the course to the bus stop.
B: I'm going from the bus stop to the office.
A: I'm going from the office to x-market.
B: I'm going from x-market to the market square.
A: I'm going from the market square to the pharmacy.
B: I'm going from the pharmacy to the cafe.
A: I'm going from the cafe to the sports park.
B: I'm going from the sports park to school.
A: I'm going from school to the bank.
B: I'm going from the bank to the airport.
